useCase.name: Search for Content
useCase.description: User speaks into the device to search for content.

preconditions.precondition: User has access to the UI interface.

successEndConditions.condition: Search results are displayed to the user.

mainSequence.step: Speech Recognition Module processes and converts speech to text.
Speech Recognition Module sends converted text to Content Query Processor.
Content Query Processor queries for matching content items in the database.
Content Query Processor displays search results to the user.
UI interface shows search results to the user.
